name: In re ADOPTION OF A. J. H. Appeal of R. S. B.
name_abbreviation: In re Adoption of A. J. H.

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ADOPTION OF A. J. H. Appeal of R. S. B.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Northumberland County is affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael A. Balducci, Sunbury, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 500
In re ADOPTION OF A. J. H. Appeal of R. S. B.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 16, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Michael A. Balducci, Sunbury, for appellant.
Sidney Apfelbaum, Sunbury, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
